library(tidyverse)

state_stats <- read_csv("D:/DropBox/Dropbox/Mail_Ballots_2020/markdown/2020G_Early_Vote.csv")

party_shell <- data.frame(Party=character(),

# Washington

WA_req_send_tot <- data.frame(Total=character(),

Last Report: `r state_stats[48,9]`  
Source:  `r state_stats[48,2]`

### Discussion

Washington is an all-mail ballot state. Ballot requests reported here are counts of the state's registered voters

### Mail Ballot Requests

``` {r echo = FALSE}
kable(WA_req_send_tot, format.args = list(big.mark = ",", 
  scientific = FALSE), digits = 1) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = "left")
```
